name: OUTLAND GAME
description:
Hello,  

my name is Rémy Kinzelin, I am a young French student in first year of computer science and I present to you my game from my very first Game Jam!  

First of all, I want to say that I did this entire project alone.  

So I present to you my game Outland which is precisely a 2d platform game in which you control a character on an island threatened by crocodiles. So you should try to survive the rounds as much as possible. As you will have understood, this game contains several rounds. Each round is separated by a pause time during which an object that gives you life points appears randomly on the map. So you have to type it.  

The orders :  

right click: single sword attack  

left click: pointing sword attack  

arrow or key (Z,Q,S,D): movement of the character 

 to run the game, please run the .exe or the .app depending on your machine.  

Good game !
